id.description: The ID of the issue link type. Used as the type of issue link in `issueLink` resource. Required on create when `name` isn't provided. Otherwise, read only.

name.description: The name of the issue link type. Used as the type of issue link in `issueLink` resource. Required on create when `id` isn't provided. Otherwise, read only.

inward.description: The description of the issue link type inward link. Read only in `issueLink` resource. Required on create and optional on update in `issueLinkType` resource. Otherwise, read only.

outward.description: The description of the issue link type outward link. Read only in `issueLink` resource. Required on create and optional on update in `issueLinkType` resource. Otherwise, read only.

self.description: The URL of the issue link type. Read only.

description: A list of issue link type beans.
